meanings.sent1: She upstepped onto the stage to receive her award.
meanings.sent2: The hiker upstepped carefully to reach the mountain peak.
meanings.sent3: The cat upstepped onto the kitchen counter to investigate the smell of fish.
meanings.sent4: His confidence upstepped when he aced the exam.
meanings.sent5: The sun upstepped over the horizon, bringing a new day.

meanings.definition: Having taken a step up or ascended.
meanings.sent1: The upstepped platform provided a better view of the concert.
meanings.sent2: The upstepped trail led to a beautiful waterfall.
meanings.sent3: The upstepped cake towered over the other desserts at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her upstepped position in the company came with more responsibilities.
meanings.sent5: The upstepped staircase was decorated with elegant railings.
